trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" /> 中的单个选项卡页。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 控件表示中的选项卡式的页<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的选项卡页的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合会反映在选项卡的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件中的选项卡的顺序，必须通过删除它们，并将它们插入到新索引处更改它们在集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 控件都受其容器，因此的某些属性继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基的类将具有不起作用，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的选项卡<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>属于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>但不是包括个人的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控件。

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>类，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>属性，会影响仅选项卡页，但不是制表符的客户端矩形。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>编辑不会隐藏选项卡。若要隐藏选项卡上，必须删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控件从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>发生。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此控件如何响应的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法，请参阅以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>成员： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>显示选项卡页，并显示的选项卡页不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定时才会创建。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性使您可以指示是否应呈现选项卡页的背景，使用当前的视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况仅当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
trans-unit.target: 否则，通常绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>具有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>具有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> constructor instantiates `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A>构造函数实例化`tabPage1`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡的文本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 类的新实例，并指定选项卡的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>属性设置为的值`text`参数。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A> constructor accepts the `myTabPage` string as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> for `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将接受`myTabPage`形式的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>为`tabPage1`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>属性和处理此事件以确定在值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>属性不是对此控件有意义。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: 控件可以根据其内容任意增大，但不会缩小至小于其大小属性值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, in which case the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性是值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>，在这种情况下的默认值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控件，你将放置在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>默认情况下，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现的值。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性将自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想要继承的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>你指定的值设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性设置后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.DockChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.DockChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.EnabledChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.EnabledChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含指定对象的选项卡页。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> that contains the specified object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />，如果无法找到该对象则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects, each containing one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> component.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>对象时，各包含一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>组件。

trans-unit.source: The parameter `button2` is passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.GetTabPageOfComponent%2A> method, which retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> containing `button2`.
trans-unit.target: 参数`button2`传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.GetTabPageOfComponent%2A>方法，检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>包含`button2`。

trans-unit.source: To verify that the correct tab page is retrieved, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> property sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> containing `button2` to the currently selected tab page.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证检索时正确的选项卡页，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>属性集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>包含`button2`到当前选定的选项卡页。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在该选项卡上显示的图像的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> that appears on the tab. The default is -1, which signifies no image.
trans-unit.target: 中的图像的从零开始索引<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" />的选项卡上显示。默认值为 -1，表示没有图像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>指向关联的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>具有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A> property to specify which image from `myImages` displays on the tab of `tabPage1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>属性指定的哪个图像`myImages`的选项卡上显示`tabPage1`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.ComponentModel>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms>, and <xref:System.Resources> namespace for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>， <xref:System.ComponentModel>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms>，和<xref:System.Resources>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex" /> value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex" /> 值小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl" /> 中的图像的键访问器。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示图像的键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageKey%2A> property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageKey%2A>属性指定要在控件上显示的图像列表中的映像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象的位置的 x 和 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>属性和处理此事件以确定在值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>属性不是对此控件有意义。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 对象的大小的上限。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 对象的大小的下限。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>发生。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnEnter(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>发生。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.OnLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，包含对于绘制背景有用的数据。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 的背景。

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 系统调用此方法来绘制背景的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>，此方法绘制背景使用当前的视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法将像往常一样绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: 可以容纳控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />.
trans-unit.target: 此成员重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified)" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 Tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指示当用户按 TAB 键在窗体上控件接收焦点的顺序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 控件都包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件，但是，并且不会收到焦点单独窗体的 tab 键顺序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此属性是此类无意义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndexChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndexChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> 控件都包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件，并且不接收焦点单独窗体的 tab 键顺序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此属性是此类无意义。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStopChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStopChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在选项卡上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 要在选项卡上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode.Fixed>.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>属性值不会不自动居中的选项卡上的新值这是如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode.Fixed>。

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置来解决此限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性或通过删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合并将其添加回集合。

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: 这两种操作将使文本自动居中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>具有一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>属性将选项卡页文本设置为`myTabPage`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该选项卡的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 该选项卡的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: 此选项卡页属于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当用户的选项卡上移动鼠标，如果不显示工具提示文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关工具提示的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>设置为允许工具提示和选项卡页分配的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> 属性值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text" /> 属性值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToString%2A> method creates a string that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> value for `tabPage1` and returns it to the `tabPage1`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToString%2A>方法创建一个包含字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>值`tabPage1`并返回到`tabPage1`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ToolTipText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>对于此示例的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当启用视觉样式时，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage" /> 背景是否使用当前视觉样式呈现。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用当前视觉样式呈现背景；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景使用当前的视觉样式时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值都是`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance.Normal>的默认值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控件，你将放置在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>默认情况下，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现的值。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性将自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想要继承的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>你指定的值设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性设置后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏选项卡中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，则必须将其删除从控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.VisibleChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.VisibleChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏选项卡中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，则必须将其删除从控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。
